rows.label: qev011001_MSG0001
rows.name: A fellow BLADE. Nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0002
rows.name:
How's business these days, friend?
Because it's been awful on my end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0003
rows.name: It was supposed to be just another hunt...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0004
rows.name: Until the Ganglion showed their ugly mugs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0005
rows.name:
My group was split up before we knew what hit us.
Had to fight our way through alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0006
rows.name: The outcome was obvious from the start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0007
rows.name:
I swear, we went into that mission prepared!
We were ready! But one unexpected situation
and a load of bad luck later...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0008
rows.name: In the end, we lost two of our brothers-in-arms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0009
rows.name: I think my days as team leader are behind me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev011001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Wang whether he knows Law.

rows.label: qev011001_JNK0020
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev011001_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Wang that you've also had your share of bad luck.

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0010
rows.name: Law? Yeah, this is the right place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0011
rows.name: Or it was, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0012
rows.name: He was one of the two men we lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0013
rows.name:
Stop. Just...stop. There's nothing worse than pity from
a fellow BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0014
rows.name:
And I realize what I said, but dismissing this whole
thing as bad luck feels like a cop-out.
Like I'm betraying Taohua and Law.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0015
rows.name: Hmm? You're here to see Law?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0016
rows.name: Bad timing, I'm afraid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0017
rows.name: Law took a bad hit when the fighting started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0018
rows.name:
We patched him up as best we could, but he still
couldn't stand, let alone run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0019
rows.name:
I had to put the team first and order an evacuation
of those who were still mobile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Don't look at me like that. We had Marnucks and
pugiliths on our asses. We were just a bunch of
grunts without Skells...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0021
rows.name:
So yeah. I left him in the middle of a pack of hostiles.
Left him to die...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0022
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Hmm? Where did I leave him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0024
rows.name: Some cavern. It was under a crumbled rock arch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0025
rows.name: Wait, you're not thinking of going out there, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0026
rows.name:
Look, don't get me wrong—if I thought I could do
something, I'd be out there right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0027
rows.name:
But they're strong. REALLY strong.
Are you sure you'll be okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0028
rows.name:
...Sorry. Never mind. You're a professional.
You can make that call for yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0029
rows.name:
Those are the first rules of being a BLADE, right?
Learning risk assessment and knowing how much
you can handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0030
rows.name: Well, if you're going to do this, let's make it official.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0031
rows.name: Please...accept this mission to extract Law.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0032
rows.name:
You'll have to secure the area first, which means
fighting through a bunch of Ganglion scum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0033
rows.name:
The cavern's northwest of here. Look for the broken
rock arch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0034
rows.name: We didn't see the Ganglion coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0035
rows.name:
It went down northwest of here, in a cavern beneath
a broken rock arch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0036
rows.name:
Don't get cocky on this one. Those bastards were
experienced fighters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0037
rows.name:
Hey, you made it back. ...And from the look on your
face, I'm guessing Law was gone when you found him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0038
rows.name:
Law was a real comedian—always keeping things light
for the team. But brave, too. The kind of bravery you
can't teach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0039
rows.name: Anyway, thanks for what you did. I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0040
rows.name:
I don't want to make this about revenge, but hopefully
our fallen brothers can rest a little easier now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0041
rows.name:
Hey, if you don't mind my asking, what did you need
with Law?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0042
rows.name: He's not around to answer, but maybe I can help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev011001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask about the key.

rows.label: qev011001_JNK0040
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev011001_SEL0041
rows.name: Check if Law ever mentioned anything about treasure.

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0043
rows.name: A key? Hmm, now that you mention it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0044
rows.name:
One night while we were drinking, Law kept going on
about some key he got and how valuable it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Thing looked ancient, so we all assumed he'd been
ripped off by some Nopon junk peddler.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0046
rows.name: But maybe the joke's on us and it was real after all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0047
rows.name: Law? Treasure? Not that I know of...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0048
rows.name: Oh, but there was this key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0049
rows.name:
He kept flashing it around one night while we were
drinking. Wouldn't stop running his mouth about how
much of a fortune it was worth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0050
rows.name: That's the only thing I can think of...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0051
rows.name:
Take a look at this. It's Law's pendant.
He never took the damned thing off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0052
rows.name: Check out the head. Looks kind of like a key, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0053
rows.name:
He kept saying it really WAS the key to something,
but we all thought it was just talk. Law always did
like to talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0054
rows.name: Honestly, I still think it's probably fake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0055
rows.name: But if you want to test that theory, be my guest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0056
rows.name:
We've got other stuff to remember him by, and I'm sure
he'd want the [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] who carried him home to be
thanked for it in some way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0057
rows.name:
Take care, [ST:playername ].
We really owe you one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0058
rows.name: And hey. If you do strike it rich off that key...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011001_MSG0059
rows.name:
buy the mother of all bouquets for Law's grave,
would you?[ST:wait ]
